mapper.select: SELECT L.locationno, L.locationtype, L.locationtitle, L.locationcreator, L.locationcontent, L.locationphone, L.locationaddress, L.locationstatus, L.view_count, L.locationname FROM LOCATION_RESERVATION LR JOIN LOCATION L ON LR.location_no=L.locationno WHERE REPLACE(SUBSTR(DAY,1,10),'/','-')=#{lismDate} AND LR.ID=#{id}
SELECT * FROM LOCATION_RESERVATION WHERE REPLACE(SUBSTR(DAY,1,10),'/','-')=#{lismDate} AND ID=#{id}
SELECT * FROM LISM WHERE LISMTITLE=#{title} AND CREATOR=#{creator}
SELECT * FROM LISMDETAIL WHERE LISMNO=#{lismNo} ORDER BY SETTIME ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LISMDETAIL WHERE LISMNO=#{no}
SELECT * FROM LOCATION_RESERVATION WHERE REPLACE(SUBSTR(DAY,1,10),'/','-')=#{date} AND ID=#{id} AND TIME=#{time}
SELECT * FROM LISMLIKECOUNT WHERE PEOPLE=#{id} AND NO=#{lismNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE LISM SET LIKECOUNT=#{count}+1 WHERE LISMNO=#{lismNo}
mapper.select: SELECT LIKECOUNT FROM LISM WHERE LISMNO=#{lismNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LISMDETAIL WHERE LISMNO=#{lismNo} AND LOCATIONNO=#{locationNo}
